channel.title: Gfx'n it up pls

item.title: Gfx'n it up pls
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“The Prodigyscape, post:9, topic:199164”]YOURS:

if (command.startsWith("heal") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Scotty")) { stillgfx(int 601, int y, int x; stillgfx(int 54, int y, int x; sendMessage("You've been healed to 100 hp"); NewHP = 100; }

WHAT IT SHOULD BE:

if (command.startsWith("heal") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Scotty")) { stillgfx(int 601, int y, int x); stillgfx(int 54, int y, int x); sendMessage("You've been healed to 100 hp"); NewHP = 100; }[/quote]
/FAIL
should be…

if (command.startsWith("heal") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Scotty")) { stillgfx(601, absY, absX); stillgfx(54, absY, absX); sendMessage("You've been healed to 100 hp"); NewHP = 100; }

Read full topic

item.title: Gfx'n it up pls

item.description:

if (command.startsWith("heal") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Scotty")) { stillgfx(601, absX, absY); stillgfx(54, absX, absY); sendMessage("You've been healed to 100 hp"); NewHP = 100; }

Help?
